name: Sosial distancing the game
description:
this game is the alpha.

i duplicate this game from livander gamedev tutorial.

you need to check the chennel? open this link: Livander Gamedev - YouTube

i just curious with this game and yes i did it!

so enjoy the game guys :)

HOW TO PLAY :

use arrow keys (left and right) to move a player.

press R to restart a game when you lose.

avoid the virus if you dont want to lose the game.

close the game in the taskbar.
